ServerGreetCommands(IHttpClientFactory, GuildSettingsService)

Handles the greet and bye messages as well as boost settings bfor the server.

Declaration
public ServerGreetCommands(IHttpClientFactory fact, GuildSettingsService guildSettings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IHttpClientFactory fact

Client factory to avoid calling httpclient every time
GuildSettingsService guildSettings

The guild setting service

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Boost()

Enables or disables boost messages.

Declaration
[Cmd("Boost")]
[Aliases("Boost")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
public Task Boost()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows users to enable or disable boost messages.

| Edit this page View Source

BoostDel(int)

Sets the timer for deleting boost messages.

Declaration
[Cmd("BoostDel")]
[Aliases("BoostDel")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
public Task BoostDel(int timer = 30)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int timer

The timer in seconds. Must be between 0 and 600.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows users to set the timer for deleting boost messages.

GreetDmTest(IGuildUser?)

Sends a test direct message greet.

Declaration
[Cmd("GreetDmTest")]
[Aliases("GreetDmTest")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[Ratelimit(5)]
public Task GreetDmTest(IGuildUser? user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuildUser user

The user to send the test direct message greet to.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows users to send a test direct message greet. Has a rate limit of 5 seconds to prevent being used for dm spam.

| Edit this page View Source

GreetHook(ITextChannel?, string?, string?, string?)

Sets up a webhook for greeting messages with an optional image.

Declaration
[Cmd("GreetHook")]
[Aliases("GreetHook")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
public Task GreetHook(ITextChannel? chan, string? name, string? image = null, string? text = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel chan

The text channel to set up the webhook in.
string name

The name of the webhook.
string image

The URL of the image to include in the webhook message.
string text

The text to include in the webhook message.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows users to set up a webhook for greeting messages with an optional image.

| Edit this page View Source
